title: Good lighting. Part 1
creator_contributor_role: Centre for Educational Television Overseas, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television - Lighting
description: The first of three films on the techniques of television lighting. The principles of showing the modelling of a subject by means of light and shade are discussed as an introduction to studio lighting. The basic three light arrangement is shown in detail. Different ways of lighting the background are also shown. Presented by Bob Holness.
